intents.d: <s>say /b 'first player is' /b followed by a name, /b to fill in the name for the first player.</s> <s>For example: /b 'first player is john'.</s>
<s>say /b ''second player is' /b followed by a name, /b to fill in the name for the second player.</s> <s>For example: /b 'second player is john'.</s>
<s>say /b 'start', /b to start a new yathzee game with the registered game configurations.</s>
<s>say /b 'take dice with number' /b followed by dice numbers, /b to take the dice with the given numbers.</s><s> For example: /b 'take dice with number one and two'.</s>
<s>say /b 'take the' /b followed by ordinal numbers /b followed by text /b 'die', /b to take the dice at the given positions.</s><s> For example: /b 'take the first, second and third die'.</s>
<s>say /b 'release dice with number' /b followed by dice numbers, /b to release the dice with the given numbers.</s><s> For example: /b 'release dice with number one and two'.</s>
<s>say /b 'release the' /b followed by ordinal numbers /b followed by text /b 'die', /b to release the dice at the given positions.</s><s> For example: /b 'release the first and second die'.</s>
<s>say /b 'roll the dice' /b to roll the dice</s>
<s>say /b 'score for' /b followed by a scorename, /b to estimate the score for the given scorename.</s><s> For example: /b '<prosody pitch='high' rate='slow'>score for one</prosody>'?</s>
<s>say /b 'score as' /b followed by a scorename, /b to score the current dice as the given scorename.</s><s> For Example: /b 'score as full house'.</s>
<s>say /b 'restart' /b to go back to the main menu.</s>
<s>say /b 'list scores' /b to list your already completed scores.</s>
<s>say /b 'missing scores' /b to list your still missing scores.</s>
<s>say /b 'dice' /b to hear the dice state</s>
<s>say /b 'whats' /b followed by a scorename, /b to retrieve an explanation for the given score. </s><s> For example: /b '<prosody pitch='high' rate='slow'>whats small straight</prosody>'?</s>
<s>say /b 'reroll' /b followed by dice numbers, /b to reroll the dice with the given numbers.</s><s> For example: /b 'reroll threes and fives'.</s>
<s>say /b 'reroll the' /b followed by ordinal numbers /b followed by text /b 'die', /b to reroll the dice at the given positions.</s><s> For example: /b 'reroll the first, second and third die'.</s>
<s>say /b 'toggle voice only' /b to toggle if the app should be usable via voice only.</s>

<s>say /b 'reroll' /b to trigger the multimodal reroll cmd.</s><s> you can use gestures, touch or voice, to specify which positional dice to be rerolled.</s><s> end the command by speaking /b 'dice'.</s>
<s>say /b 'score as' /b trigger the multimodal scoring cmd.</s><s> you can use gestures '1' to '6', touch or voice, to specify the score.</s>
<s>say /b 'end' /b followed by /b 'the game' /b in order to close the game.</s>
